turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to put in a coffe order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. For which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be going to the Starbucks in the Fred Meyer's in Soldotna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay that is on the Sterling Highway?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What can I order you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the Black and White Mocha seasonal special.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yum. What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what kind of milk? It typically comes with 2%.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Lets make it with skim.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so a grande Black and White Mocha with skim. This has a whipped topping, is that how'd you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, leave the whipped topping.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay leaving the whipped topping. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No just the one coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so I have a Grande Black and White Mocha with skim milk and whipped topping. It is being order from the Starbucks in the Fred Meyer's on the Sterling Highway in Soldotna, AK.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. The order will be ready soon at the location you asked for. The receipt will be sent via text to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay thats great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Nothing else for right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Bye!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye.
